TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed MessageQueuePermissionAccess extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines access levels used by permission classes.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess Administer = int32(62)

Docs.summary: The can look at the queues that are available, read the messages in the queue, and send and receive messages.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess Browse = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The can look at the queues that are available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess None = int32(0)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess Receive = int32(26)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess Send = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The can look at the queues that are available and send messages.
